title: Greek Salad
description: Our classic Greek salad has fresh lettuce, peppers, olives, and Chicago-style feta cheese. We top it with crunchy croutons flavored with garlic and rosemary.

title: Bruschetta
description: We make our bruschetta with grilled bread rubbed with garlic. Then we add salt and olive oil for extra taste.

title: Lemon Dessert
description: This recipe comes right from grandma's old book. We use real ingredients that are as true to the original as you can get.
